author: dkulp
msg: Pass in the RequestData to the various processors and validators instead of the individual fields.  This allows delayed creation of things like cryptos and callback handlers as well as gives the validators and handlers access to request specific information that they may need.

author: sebb
msg: NET-314 The FTP client should autodetect the control encoding.
